_note: Procedure-focused descriptions for BIDS desc- entities. Descriptions explain WHAT PROCESSING was done, not what the data represents. The suffix (e.g., _bold, _mask) indicates what the data IS; the desc- indicates what procedure created it.

brain.base: Brain extraction via {mask_source} segmentation, projected and binarized

hmc.base: Rigid-body volume-to-reference registration for head motion estimation

fmap.base: Fieldmap estimation and registration to functional reference

goodvoxels.base: Voxel exclusion based on local coefficient of variation threshold (HCP-style surface projection)

summary.base: Aggregation of processing parameters and metadata for quality review

validation.base: Automated input data validation and metadata consistency checks

fmapCoreg.base: Visualization of fieldmap-to-functional reference alignment quality

sdc.base: Before/after comparison of susceptibility distortion correction

rois.base: Visualization of anatomical ROI masks used for signal extraction

compcorvar.base: Cumulative variance plot for CompCor component selection criterion

confoundcorr.base: Pairwise correlation analysis of extracted nuisance timeseries

carpetplot.base: Grayplot (carpet plot) generation with motion and signal quality traces

t2scomp.base: Multi-echo T2* estimation quality visualization via echo comparison

t2starhist.base: Histogram analysis of estimated T2* values across brain tissue

aparcaseg.base: FreeSurfer cortical parcellation projection to functional space

aseg.base: FreeSurfer subcortical segmentation projection to functional space
